critique: This executive order expands the Navajo Reservation. This likely has a slight liberal ideological tilt as it favors indigenous populations. It has a slightly open immigration approach as it allows for the expansion of a reservation. It likely has a slight expansion of executive power as it is an executive order. It likely has a slight shift towards federal primacy as it is a federal action impacting territories. It likely has a neutral approach to national security vs. civil liberties. It likely has a neutral approach to economic regulation. It likely has a slight emphasis on diversity/pluralism as it favors indigenous populations.
